title: How to become a freelance marketer - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear anonymous . I'll be frank with you. I didn't read any books when I wanted to jump into freelancing, I just did. Joined few websites started bidding on projects. Of-course books can help if you want to work on your skills, but why go to books, go learn the hard way :P that could be fun too. You've mentioned engineering, so I understand the connection with books :D but say goodbye to them now. P.S. - if your question is more about resources (not books) and where to start - please let me know, I can suggest few things.

You just go on Upwork and find clients. Make a profile as soon as possible and start applying to jobs. I’ve helped a bunch of people get started and made some content that should help. Checkout Home - Upwork Saved My Life and read some of the stuff I’m doing.
